name: Kharazim
title: Veradani Monk
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Radiant Dash
abilities.description: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Breath of Heaven
abilities.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 290 and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Deadly Reach
abilities.description: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

heroics.name: Seven-Sided Strike
heroics.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

heroics.name: Divine Palm
heroics.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1141 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.
